How much does a Babysitter charge every month near my location in 2024? What is the right salary or cost for hiring a Babysitter near me in 2024?

The average monthly cost of hiring a Babysitter in 2024 varies between ₹13,000 to ₹14,000.

They usually prefer coming in the morning and leaving in the evening.

However, if you are looking for a Live-in Babysitter, they usually charge monthly salaries in the range of ₹17,000 to ₹18,000.

Furthermore, if you are looking for Babysitters who are a little better profile (Like the ones who work for the Expats in India), they usually end up charging around ₹20,000 to ₹23,000.
